body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Walter Watson and the customer's name is Amber Morris.  The conversation is about Bob's Gym (a Gym ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling ABC Customer Support. My name is Sarah. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, my name is John. I'm having some issues with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, John. Let's see how we can resolve this. May I have your account number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. For security purposes, could you also provide your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's January fifteenth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thanks for that information. I'm pulling up your account details now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Alright, John. I've found your account and it appears there was a technical glitch. I've resolved the issue for you. You should be able to access your account now.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's wonderful news, Sarah. Thank you so much for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for calling ABC Customer Support. Have a great day!
